price: 130. Nous éprouvâmes le peuple de Pharaon par une succession d’années maigres et une pénurie de fruits afin qu’ils se rappellent.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَخَذۡنَآ ءَالَ فِرۡعَوۡنَ بِٱلسِّنِينَ وَنَقۡصٖ مِّنَ ٱلثَّمَرَٰتِ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَذَّكَّرُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: walaqad akhadhnā āla fir'ʿawna bil-sinīna wanaqṣin mina al-thamarāti laʿallahum yadhakkarūna
